column4: have a question. is it possible to install kubuntu/ubuntu on my 512 mb flash mp3 player?
have a question. is it possible to install kubuntu/ubuntu on my 512 mb flash mp3 player?
I don't think it would run well
does it act as a usb pen? if it does, you might want to look into DSL (www.damnsmalllinux.org) I don't know about having both mp3's and an OS installed though
